qas.question: Solar water disinfection is recommended by which organization?
How long should the plastic bottles filled with water be exposed to sunlight during Solar water disinfection?

answers.text: a minimum of six hours to two days during fully overcast conditions

qas.question: What does the World Health Organization say about Solar water disinfection?

qas.question: How many people use Solar water disinfection to disinfect their drinking water?

answers.text: Over two million people in developing countries
